entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SPRINKLES
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
